head: Divorce Notice.
ab: TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON, Third Judical District, County of Jefferson.
p: To James Turk:—You are hereby notified that Anna Turk has filed a complaint against you in the U.S. District Court. Third Judicial District, holding terms at Port Townsend W. T., which will come on to be heard before said Court, or the Judge thereof, on teh 20th day of June 1865, (if that should be a day of jurisdiction, otherwise, on the next day of jurisdiction thereafter,) and unless you appear and answer, the Plaintiff will apply to the Court or Judge for the relief therein prayed for.
The object and prayer of said complaint is to obtain a decree of Divorce on the grounds of abandonment.
B. F. DENNISON, Att'y for Plaintiff.
